law.text: There is hereby created a Miami-Dade County Citizens Task Force on incorporation consisting of thirteen (13) members, one (1) member to be appointed by each County Commissioner. The task force shall remain in existence until September 30, 1994.

The task force shall submit a written report to the County Commission with its recommendations relating to subsections 2-652(1) and (3) hereof no later than February 28, 1994. The task force shall submit a written report to the County Commission with its recommendations relating to subsection 2-652(2) hereof no later than September 30, 1994.
law.footnote: FOOTNOTE(S): --- (75) --- Editor's note— Ord. No. 93-78, adopted July 29, 1993, amended the Code by the addition of provisions which have been designated at the discretion of the editor as Art. LVI, §§ 2-651—2-653. (Back)
